PageTitle: reset ipv6 nd multicast-suppress dynamic bridge-domain
FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd multicast-suppress dynamic bridge-domain command clears dynamic proxy ND entries in a specified BD.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd multicast-suppress dynamic bridge-domain [ <bd-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the BD in which dynamic proxy ND entries are deleted.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd multicast-suppress dynamic bridge-domain 10
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the number of dynamic proxy ND entries exceeds a specified threshold, run the reset ipv6 nd multicast-suppress dynamic bridge-domain command to clear dynamic proxy ND entries in a specified BD.
